      • buildSettlement

        public void buildSettlement()
        Builds settlement on clicked coordinates, by converting the area of the click into the correct point. Then the method calculates the 3 adjacent hexagons, if they refer to an existing and empty Corner the information will be given to the serve to build a settlement.
